resources.string: 5. In the same command prompt, type siad --disable-api-security --authenticate-api -a <ip>:<port>, replacing <ip> with your computer\'s internal IP address from step 4, and <port> with a port number of your choosing; remember your port number for later. This step will launch Sia on your computer in a fashion that allows Sia Mobile to interact with it. You will need to keep this command prompt open and running to use Sia Mobile with it.

8. (optional) Following the steps above, you will only be able to access your computer\'s Sia from your phone when your phone is on the same network as your computer. In order to access it from anywhere, you will have to port forward on your router on your chosen port to your computer\'s internal IP address. Many guides exist online detailing how to do this.
